Kusnier & Sva Duo Tracker

Welcome to our duo hunting collaboration! This page tracks all the hunting spots we plan to test together as a Monk and a Sorcerer duo. We'll be updating this page with experience rates and loot values as we test each spawn.
Videos from each place will also be linked over time.

The loot values provided are per player per hour. For example a total profit of 500k in a 2 hour hunt would be given as 125k.

Follow our journey live on Kick:
kick.com/Kusnier
kick.com/Sva69
